title: [机械]PermissionsHealth_0.2.01 —— 通过权限修改玩家血量的插件[1.5.1-R0.1]
author: wolski
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wolski 于 2013-6-17 02:59 编辑 






p.jpg (121.69 KB, 下载次数: 18)

下载附件

2013-4-10 16:56 上传






简介
这是一个简单、轻量的插件，你可以通过不同的权限给不同的组/玩家不一样的血量~ 如上图所示
目测这插件在RPG服、帮派、职业划分和某些PVP竞技活动中比较有用~

指令&权限
/pheal 治愈自己
/pheal <玩家> 治愈其他人
注：其他插件的治愈指令只能回20点血量！
所需权限: permissionshealth.pheal

/phc
/hp
查看自己血量
/pho <玩家>
查看他人血量
所需权限: permissionshealth.pho

/phreload
重载插件
所需权限: permissionshealth.reload

配置文件
特别注意！ 血量设置不得低于3点，不得高于10000点，否则会出问题！

#没有任何本插件权限的玩家拥有的血量
#
GuestHealth: 20
#
#permissionshealth.hp.1 —— 这是权限~
Health1: 25 —— 拥有本权限玩家的血量
# 以下略
#permissionshealth.hp.2
Health2: 30
#
#permissionshealth.hp.3
Health3: 20
#
.....
此处略去N个权限，插件最多支持200条！
.....
#permissionshealth.admin
#这条是OP血量~
AdminHealth: 200
复制代码

支持（推荐）插件

Health-Heads
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Health-Bar
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HealthDisplay
注：1000 health = 500 ❤ 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TimedPex is a plugin which automatically ranks users to another PermissionsEx group after a set period of time. This can be useful for servers that have a hierarchy by gameplay time, or to automatically change players from 'default' or guest ranks to 'member' for being active on a server.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ServerSigns lets you buy with in-game money Permission/Groups/Ranks/Classes/Races and those could have a Permission Health node in them Granting or taking life depending on how you have it setup in the Permission Health config and what node you used in the making of Permission/Groups/Ranks/Classes/Races there are other plugins out there like this if you know one better and have tested it let me know and i be glad to add it.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

关于给组分配权限特别需要注意的问题！
如果因为inheritance其他组造成多个血量权限存在会出问题，典型错误示例戳下面

groups:
  Guest:
    default: true
    permissions:[]
    inheritance:
    - ''
    prefix: 'Guest'
  Tank:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - permissionshealth.hp.1
    inheritance:
    - ''
    prefix: 'Tank'
  Archer:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - permissionshealth.hp.2
    inheritance:
    - Tank
    prefix: '&Archer'
  Knight:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - permissionshealth.hp.3
    inheritance:
    - Tank
    prefix: '&Knight'复制代码
所以分配权限时要特别留意一下！

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
wjtcc 发表于 2013-4-10 18:26 
那应该怎么改default builder组的血量？
builder默认继承了default的所有权限
那就把每个组的完整权限都分开写出来呗。。。 不用inheritance
